title: 30 Best Tools for Red Teaming: Mitigating Bias, AI Vulnerabilities
description: Granica: Great for Safeguarding LLM Data. In this guide, we'll discuss leading red teaming tools and what to look for in a solution. We'll also share 30 best tools for red teaming, including Granica, which is highlighted for its capabilities in safeguarding large language model (LLM) data.

title: Introducing Granica: The AI Efficiency Platform
description: Granica is an AI efficiency platform that focuses on increasing the signal-to-noise ratio of information. It offers services to make data cheaper to store, safer to use, and easier to access, particularly for petabyte-scale data in the cloud.
